system.description:
Trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Crystal
Effect: On hit, all valid targets have a 30% chance of gaining Paralyzed 5. Upon resolving this attack, the user freely uses Electric Terrain.
Requirement: [Electric] Z-Crystal as an Accessory Item and an Electric-Type attack on the user's Active List.

actions.name: Gigavolt Havoc
